attributes.action: Equitable treatment of MPs who have defied a three line whip in this Parliament
attributes.background: During the course of this Parliament, many MPs have defied their party's Whip. To call for the deselection of MPs who have voted with their conscience not only appears draconian and unjustified; it is inconsistent. Rules should be applied consistently, irrespective of the issue at hand.

rejection.details: This is a matter for political parties rather than the Government or Parliament as a whole.
